text: James Henry Kenneth Oliver (10 August 1924 – 13 May 1994) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:1994 deaths Category:People from Loughborough Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Brush Sports F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Exeter City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ken Oliver
